programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Jacky es expulsada de la casa y Fernanda decide irse con ella. Chile y Isa se entregan al poliamor y Diana teme sufrir represalias. Los Shores se relajan en la playa pero las insolencias de Diego fastidian a todos.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Aunque las vacaciones ya están por terminarse, el ritmo nunca decae en Acapulco y el Boss tiene sorpresas de despedida para los Shores: Tragos en yate y una fiesta final que promete ser inolvidable.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Ultimo día en Acapulco y los Shores prometen llevar la fiesta a otro nivel. Jacky y Fernanda no quieren quedarse afuera y tienen varias sorpresas preparadas para sus compañeros. Será una fiesta final épica.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Con el inicio de las vacaciones, los shores se juntan para dar la bienvenida a los nuevos miembros de la familia. Alba se encuentra cara a cara con Diego y Karime, mientras que Chile toma la decisión de hacer justicia con el ladrón de sus frases.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: La fiesta en la casa continua y la discusión entre Chile y Diego tiene un desenlace inesperado. Isa toma una decisión que lamentará y un nuevo integrante se une a la familia shore aunque su bienvenida no será la mejor.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: La paz y la armonía reinan, y el jefe visita al grupo. Fernanda aparece, pero ignora a "Matryoshka". Carlos vive cinco minutos inolvidables, mientras Karime organiza una cita romántica que podría salir mal.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: La cita de Karime y Fernanda da un giro inesperado, y el grupo se dirige a una fiesta. Un visitante causa sensación, y Jacky lo invita a la casa, pero los chicos se sienten incómodos y quieren sacarlo.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Rocío se une al grupo con ganas de venganza. Santiago y Alba sorprenden a todos con una ceremonia poliamorosa. Diego no puede controlar su bebida y su forma de festejar le pasa factura.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: La fiesta sigue, pero Diego toma una decisión sorprendente. Jaylín se une al grupo y, mientras su bienvenida se descontrola, Karime organiza la primera iniciación en la casa.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: La iniciación de Alba concluye con éxito, pero Jacky aprovecha a Altafulla para incomodarla. Una nueva invitada llega a la casa y Carlos queda cautivado por su encanto, mientras que José y Beni se enfrentan por la atención de Karime.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Los conflictos entre Alba y Altafulla se intensifican. Chile y Beni compiten por llevar a una invitada al despacho. Jacky, tras pasarse de copas, toma una decisión que transformará su relación con Altafulla.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore
programme.desc: Jacky confronta a todos en la casa para exigir la expulsión de Altafulla. Karime organiza una cita muy mexicana con la intención de espantar a José. Un invitado sorprende a todos, especialmente a Chile y Karime.

programme.title: Acapulco Shore

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When you eat chicken frequently, it pays to have a number of preparations on hand. In this episode, we turn to orange-flavored chicken and chicken teriyaki.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: One of our favorite Spanish dishes is paella. But with a lengthy ingredient list the shopping alone can give the home cook pause. We take a hard look at paella to see if we can pare back this dish to its humble origins without losing its alluring flavors.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bryan uncovers the secrets to making Hawaiian-Style Fried Chicken with Bridget. Next, Adam reviews plastic wrap with Julia. Then, Jack challenges Bridget to a tasting of potato chips. Finally, Natalie makes Julia Hawaiian Macaroni Salad.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Natalie prepares Cast Iron Baked Chicken with Bridget. Next, Jack challenges Julia to a tasting of hot sauce. Finally, Ashley shows Julia how to make foolproof Blueberry Cornbread with Honey Butter.

programme.desc: Christie and Julia reveal the steps to making a showstopping Blueberry Jam Cake. Then, Adam reviews toasters with Bridget.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Ashley brings Julia into the kitchen to make Monroe County–Style Pork Chops. Next, Adam reviews pie servers with Bridget. Finally, Christie shows Bridget the secrets to reimagining a retro dessert, Coconut Cream Pie.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bryan and Julia team up to make a New Orleans classic, Shrimp Po’ Boys. Then, Jack challenges Bridget to a tasting of a Mardi Gras favorite, king cakes. Finally, Ashley and Bridget make a Cajun specialty, Chicken Sauce Piquant.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Christie and Bridget uncover the secrets to making a flavorful Double-Crust Chicken Pot Pie from scratch. Next, Jack challenges Julia to a tasting of creamy peanut butter. Finally, Ashley makes Julia a delicious First Lady specialty, Cowboy Cookies.

programme.title: Cook's Country
programme.desc: Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison Monterey Bay Cioppino. Equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for can openers. Morgan Bolling makes host Bridget Lancaster Shrimp Mozambique.

programme.title: Julia at Home
programme.desc: Julia makes roast beef weeknight-friendly with her cast-iron roast beef with gravy, salt-crusted fingerling potatoes, and carrot-noodle salad with homemade harissa and honey.

programme.title: Julia at Home
programme.desc: Julia makes her favorite weeknight dinner featuring a butterflied and Za'tar rubbed roast chicken with homemade preserved lemons, kale and sweet potato salad with pomegranate vinaigrette, and cozy coconut rice pudding.

programme.title: Julia at Home

programme.title: Julia at Home
programme.desc: Julia plans a date night with Ian featuring herb-crusted beef tenderloin for two, air-fryer cheesy potatoes, marinated tomato salad with arugula and goat cheese, followed by decadent creme brulees for two.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We set out to develop a hassle-free pizza recipe especially for the grill—one we hope will become a new backyard barbecue favorite.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pork loin is delicious roasted in the oven, but it takes on a new character when cooked on the grill. The fire imparts a delicate smokiness to the meat, and the heat creates a handsome crust. French potato salad is a perfect counterpoint to the pork.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted to develop a recipe for pulled pork that rivals that of the best barbecue joints but won't be an all-day affair. We pair the pork with another barbecue classic—cornbread.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: With its impressive mounds of tender, juicy apples and melt-in-your-mouth pastry crust, deep-dish apple pie should take your breath away. Creating a pie with such a high volume of filling does, however, pose challenges.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: There seems to be a cookie to fit any occasion or mood. In this episode we look at two from opposite ends of the style spectrum—the thick, homey oatmeal and the dainty, elegant spritz.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we aim to resurrect the traditional birthday cake. We've developed an honest-to-goodness layer cake with an old-fashioned jam filling and real butter frosting—the type of cake guaranteed to put a smile on anyone's face.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: German chocolate cake—filled with sticky pecans and coconut—is not without flaws. We set out to develop a German chocolate cake that avoids the common pitfalls and delivers on its promise.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We set out to make a meatloaf with well-seasoned meat and just enough binder to give the loaf a tender, not tough, texture. In choosing a side dish to partner with our meatloaf, we turned to another old-fashioned dish—skillet-roasted potatoes.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Dinners prepared entirely in one skillet are perfect for weeknight cooking. Less cleanup is one obvious benefit. A skillet also gives the cook a bit more control over cooking multiple elements.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Beef, beer, and onions have a natural affinity—it's one reason burgers and onion rings are often on bar menus. In a carbonnade, the beef melds with the soft sweetness of sliced onions in a lightly thickened broth that is rich, deep, and satisfying.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted a streamlined version of roast chicken with plenty of stuffing to go around. First, we needed to solve the problem of cooking the stuffing to a safe temperature without drying out the delicate breast meat of the chicken.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Boneless pork chops are lean and quick-cooking, making them ideal for weeknight meals. Pork tenderloin, which is also lean, has a somewhat fussy reputation, but you don't need to be a professional chef to cook tenderloin properly.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon travels to Oakland, California, to help Marshawn Lynch turn around his bar, Rob Ben's, by teaching the NFL star to treat his staff less like family and more like a team.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon, joined by rapper T-Pain, is in Sacramento, California, to convince Kings fan Chris he needs to change his sports bar concept if he's ever going to make money.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon heads to the Silver Dollar in Chula Vista, California, where the unresolved tensions between the father and son owners have led to operational issues and neglect.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon does reconnaissance at Kalaveraz Cocina-Cantina in Escondido, California, and finds an owner so in over his head that he's resorted to not paying his staff.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon heads to Pepe's Mexican Restaurant & Cantina in Canyon Lake, California, to help a once-bustling bar that's now a ghost town and open the disconnected owners' eyes.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon goes to Orange County, California, and attempts to revitalize Pineapple Hill Grill, a neighborhood bar whose owner's hands-off approach puts patrons at risk.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon drops in on the lively Bottoms Up Bar and Grill in Stanton, California, to teach the owner's son how to manage a rowdy atmosphere while still keeping patrons happy.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon heads to Phoenix to help the owner of The Armadillo Grill get her business back in order as she desperately tries to pay back her father, but faces $450,000 of debt.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon attempts to save the legendary Las Vegas speakeasy Capo's Restaurant and bring it back to its pre-pandemic glory.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: In his hometown of Las Vegas, Jon rescues a beloved party bar that blames their downfall on the pandemic until Jon discovers the truth.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: After running a successful floral business for two decades, owner Randi thought she could parlay that success into a budding new bar. Unfortunately, she never rose to the occasion.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: In his second-ever re-rescue, Jon Taffer returns to Champagne's Cafe to help the struggling bar survive the pandemic and maintain its Las Vegas legacy.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer must save an ambitious but rookie family-run brewery that was forced to open during the pandemic.

programme.title: Bar Rescue

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it. Mitch must help the Chinese woman find her sister. Back at headquarters, Matt and Garner deal with a beach robbery scam.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts, putting the lifeguards on high alert. Meanwhile, Mitch has to save one of Kaye's employees whose violent husband has come looking for her.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Hobie is thrilled when the “Johnny Danger Stunt Show" comes to the beach, but Mitch finds Johnny has questionable morals and is worried Hobie may follow his example. Matt is accused of sexual harassment by bad girl lifeguard Neely.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again. The explosion of an offshore oil rig endangers Stephanie, Cody, and Neely.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: As the crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, Cody, Neely, and Stephanie begin a desperate rescue effort to save the two young couples, and themselves, until the Baywatch lifeguards can arrive to help.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Kaye Morgan asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children. Things take a dangerous turn when a huge brush fire traps Hobie and the blind children in the hills, and Mitch is the only one who can save them.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Caroline tries to stop her sister from making the worst mistake of her life. Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach. Mitch enlists the Beach Boys for a benefit concert to raise money to clean up the pollution.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch's mother arrives in town for a visit, and after some strange occurrences, he insists she sees a doctor. Meanwhile, Cody loses the motivation to continue his Olympic training and it is up to Stephanie to reinspire him.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina which turns dire when two of the girls get trapped in a flooded cave. Meanwhile, a woman who dies in a car accident bequeaths an odd inheritance to Mitch…

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Hobie's new friend Isaac is an angry kid who will do anything to get his father's attention. His risky behavior is a problem for the lifeguards. Meanwhile, Caroline meets a jockey who has lost the will to race after an accident.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Logan borrows Cody's car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police. Meanwhile, the Baywatch team settles an internal dispute with a paintball war and C.J. takes in an injured sea lion, causing problems with her roommates.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Matt Brody returns to Baywatch and ends up trapped on a yacht with Neely when a group of ruthless pirates takes hostages. Meanwhile, Joey's past may jeopardize her adoption by Mitch.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Logan and Caroline’s relationship hits a new low when Caroline returns his engagement ring, but things change when a baby is left in Logan’s possession. Meanwhile, Cody must overcome yet another setback to his Olympic career.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Caroline blames herself for a teen's death in a fiery nighttime boating accident and goes through Critical Incident Stress. Pushing everyone away, Caroline begins partying to distract from her guilt. Can the team help her recover from her PTSD?

programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes to Rio Rancho, NM. Welterweight Champion Ben Askren takes on Welterweight season 8 tournament winner Andrey Koreskov. Then Michael Chandler defends his Lightweight belt against the Lightweight season 8 tournament winner David Rickels.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Michael Chandler once again goes up against Eddie Alvarez in a rematch for the Lightweight title. Also, Pat Curran defends his Featherweight belt against Daniel Straus and King Mo takes on Emanuel Newton for the Light Heavyweight title.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes to Atlantic City, NJ. The Heavyweight belt is on the line as champion Alexander Volkov takes on Vitaly Minakov. Then in the main in the event Quinton 'Rampage' Jackson makes his Bellator MMA debut against Joey Beltran.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA is in Hammond, Indiana with the Featherweight World Title on the line as Champ Daniel Straus and former Champ Pat Curran meet for a third time to decide who walks away with the title.

programme.title: Bellator 123: Curran vs Pitbull 2
programme.desc: Bellator MMA heads to Mohegan Sun as Pat Curran looks to defend his featherweight belt against bitter rival Patricio Pitbull. Also on the card, WWE superstar Bobby Lashley returns to the cage, along with knockout artists Cheick Kongo and King Mo.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes to Plymouth, Missouri with the Light Heavyweight World Title on the line as Champ Emanuel Newton takes on journeyman Joey Beltran.

programme.title: Bellator 125: Manhoef vs Marshall
programme.desc: Bellator MMA heads to Fresno, California with a showdown between middleweight knockout artists Doug Marshall and Melvin Manhoef. Also in action is submission ace Goiti Yamauchi, Javy Ayala, and Rafael Carvalho.

programme.title: Bellator 131: Ortiz vs. Bonnar
programme.desc: The talking is over. Bonnar. Ortiz. Time to fight.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards

programme.title: Bellator 138: Kimbo vs Shamrock
programme.desc: Bellator MMA presents a grudge match seven years in the making as Kimbo Slice finally meets Ken Shamrock. Patricio Pitbull goes to war with Daniel Weichel for the featherweight title. Plus WWE superstar Bobby Lashley and Michael Chandler return to action.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Jean says her 17-year-old daughter, Cheyenne, was the all-American girl , a cheerleader, track star and straight-A honor student until she began dating Josh, a 28-year-old divorced father. Dr. Phil takes a look at Josh's history, should Jean be concerned?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Mark & ex-wife, Melissa, say daughter, Malia, 17, has been running away since age 13, a 6th grade school drop out, & has become physically abusive. They say 2 years ago she became involved with a 35-year-old man & they fear she'll end up dead.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Is it wrong to go dating for dollars? Dr. Phil's guests say if you want to court them, you have to pay to play! Two self-proclaimed gold diggers share their tips for getting loot, and a woman wonders if it's wrong to be attracted to wealthy men.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Stacey & Dan say daughter Tylor, 18, is a rageaholic who is verbally, mentally & physically abusive. They have called the police 30 times, have had Tylor arrested 10 times & now Tylor is 7 weeks pregnant! Can this family join forces for the unborn child?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Anita, 73, married to the CEO of fast food restaurant chain Wendy's, is a felon, convicted of scamming friends & employees out of a half million dollars. Anita said she was duped by Ohio State, NFL quarterback, Art Schlichter. Victim or co-conspirator?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Courtney claims her former friend Amie has lied about being pregnant three times and losing five babies total. To uncover the truth, Dr. Phil producers spoke with the county coroner, the hospital, and tracked down one of the supposed fathers-to-be. Part 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Stephanie was an aspiring songwriter who loved taking care of kids. Diana was a preschool teacher with a bright future. Neither of these women knew they could end up addicted to drugs.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil meets a hard-working nurse who says in 2013 she bought a timeshare in Cabo San Lucas. She received a call from an "an attorney" in Mexico stating there was a data breach at her resort & she was entitled to a $38,580 settlement. See what unfolds!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Marie says husband Ron has a violent temper & she fears her safety & of their 4-yr-old. She alleges Ron pushed her down the stairs & wrote "kill" on a bathroom mirror. Ron says Marie mixes her meds with alcohol. Dr. Phil cameras record the chaos at home.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Susan emailed Dr. Phil claiming she's at war with her son-in-law, David & daughter, Bekah. Susan is not sure why she's not allowed to see her grandchildren, but claims Bekah blames her "sinful behavior." Can Susan mend things to see her grandkids again?

programme.title: Dr. Phil

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando se encuentran cuerpos en lugares públicos alrededor de Boston, el UAC investiga si un taxi o servicio de transporte que las víctimas utilizaron antes de su muerte podría guiar hasta el sospechoso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC busca un móvil y un sospechoso cuando las víctimas se encuentran en los inodoros de las paradas de camiones a lo largo de las carreteras en todo el sur.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El Director Vance, aún de luto por la pérdida de su mujer y la madre de sus hijos, descubre inesperada información personal que le generará dudas sobre absolutamente todo.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: NCIS rastrea intensamente a Ducky y Jimmy luego de haber desaparecido mientras transportaban el cuerpo de una escena del crimen.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Un frenesí mediático en torno a un criminal no identificado lleva al barbero de Gibbs a cuestionar la participación de su hijo y pedirle ayuda para descartarlo como el principal sospechoso.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: La esposa de un Marine especializado en la detección de bombas K-9 urge al equipo de NCIS para que investigue la reciente muerte de su marido en Afghanistan.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ayúdame a ayudarte
programme.desc: Linda pide a Danny y Báez que ayuden a su compañera de trabajo, quien está teniendo problemas con su exmarido enfurecido.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Amigos en necesidad
programme.desc: Jamie y Danny difieren en cómo manejar a un novato imprudente del NYPD, Marcus, hijo de un amigo de Danny. Mientras tanto, Erin investiga una mala inversión en la que se vio envuelto su investigador, Anthony, por culpa de su primo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ciudad despiadada
programme.desc: Frank y Danny colaboran para ayudar a Nick Constantine, un exconvicto rehabilitado que Frank había encarcelado años atrás, cuando Constantine se ve implicado en el asesinato de un viejo enemigo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Consecuencias del pasado
programme.desc: Danny y Baez buscan a una banda de ladrones en una ola de crímenes, y se unen al detective Jimmy Mosley, quien años atrás rompió el corazón de Baez.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC busca un móvil y un sospechoso cuando las víctimas se encuentran en los inodoros de las paradas de camiones a lo largo de las carreteras en todo el sur.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando una chica de 18 años escapa de una casa suburbana donde estuvo cautiva por años con otras dos mujeres, el UAC busca al sospechoso que las secuestró.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC lleva a cabo una búsqueda en Los Ángeles después de que el equipo descubre imágenes de seguridad que muestran a un sospechoso siendo invitado a las casas de las víctimas.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando Morgan es secuestrado, la UAC se apresura a buscarlo y salvarle la vida.

programme.title: Racing Wives
programme.desc: Whitney and Mariel reconcile their friendship, Mariel finds a wedding venue, Samantha worries about her reproductive health, and Amber pushes forward with her racing career.

programme.title: Racing Wives
programme.desc: The ladies head to Daytona for one of the most dangerous races of the season, and Amber struggles to land a sponsor.

programme.title: Racing Wives
programme.desc: Hostilities are renewed when Whitney and Mariel snub Ashley's invite to Kurt's birthday party, and Samantha helps Amber prepare for her big race at Hickory Motor Speedway.

programme.title: Racing Wives
programme.desc: Kyle helps Amber improve her lap time on the track, signaling to Samantha that she's ready for the big leagues, and Whitney tries to apologize for missing Kurt's birthday.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: After an unusual online audition process, the rookie candidates for the 2020 squad move into an isolated training camp bubble amid the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The 20 rookies try to master a socially distanced version of the famous kick line and some intricate choreography, and Kelli helps the ladies get fitted for uniforms.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Guest choreographers test the rookies with new routines, the veterans arrive at camp determined to earn back their spots, and country star Mickey Guyton has inspiring words for the hopefuls.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The pressure's on for rookies and vets as the hopefuls head to the stadium for their first field rehearsal, and Kelli and Judy must decide which women won't move on in training camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The rookies outshine the veterans when choreographer Travis Wall teaches a sexy dance number, and Kelli and Judy give some of the vets a wake-up call.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The dancers get a chance to showcase their unique talents during show group auditions, and Kelli and Judy deliberate with guest judges to select the elite squad.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The dancers test their ability to think on their toes during a series of mock-press interviews, and as auditions wind down, a shocking bit of news shakes up the process for Kelli and Judy.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy make cuts via video chat after a positive test for COVID-19 halts camp, Charlotte Jones hands out the iconic uniforms, and the team performs its game-day entrance.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/9/2017. Tracking the evolution of inappropriate humor throughout history, showcasing the work from groundbreaking comedians who risked their careers, prison sentences, and even their lives as they fought against censorship.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/16/2017. Exploring and celebrating the greatest female comedians of all time and how they were able to succeed in every genre where humor is found despite rampant sexism and prejudice.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 2/23/2017. Examining how comedians find humor in the simple daily experiences we all share to make us laugh.

programme.title: The History of Comedy
programme.desc: Aired 7/23/2017. Tracing the origins of topical humor from the invention of the monologue to the fake news shows of today.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers dispatch the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspect who flees on foot. A suspicious male walking down the street is arrested with a large bag containing stolen goods and drug paraphernalia.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers smell the pungent odor of marijuana during a minor traffic violation. Cocaine is found on a suspect pulled over for a broken windshield. A store is robbed by someone in a red dress.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Suspects in a white van throw a bike at police during a wild pursuit. A man runs from Deputies on a mini-bike. A mermaid commits traffic infractions and is caught with pills.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect resisting arrest draws a crowd, a homeless man decides to camp out in someone's house while they're in the hospital and a traffic stop results in a drug arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man loses his friend and finds trouble, officers stop a vehicle they believe was involved in a shooting, and a suspicious vehicle leads to a suspicious story.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Cops pursue a man skipping bail, an impaired driver is surprisingly cooperative, and officers struggle to remove a violent offender from a crime scene.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man gets Tased while resisting arrest, police interrupt a transaction going down in a parked vehicle, and a man fired from his job vents his anger at a gas station.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man involved in a drug deal claims he works for the task force. An irate woman slams the front door when officers arrive. Police pull over two young suspects in an area known for drug activity.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police collect DNA to establish ownership of a sketchy cigarette pack, investigate an assault between elderly roommates, and question a man claiming to be framed by his ex.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A passenger flees during a traffic stop, deputies respond to a heated dispute between roommates, and an officer encounters an armed suspect.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A brokenhearted man sends deputies on a dangerous pursuit through town, officers uncover a weapon during a traffic stop, and a woman is detained for driving a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect fresh out of jail is found with narcotics. A motorcycle named 'Love Machine' is saved from a hot wire. A man bursts his tire in a bad place and officers come to the rescue.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A police pursuit of a truck leaving a known drug location ends in a crash, undercover officers move in for a drug bust, and a man recklessly fires his handgun in the street.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Meth and alcohol cloud the tragic accusations between husband and wife. A man learns why you should report if you recover your stolen vehicle. A woman says heroin is the only thing that can heal her.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A bicycle chase leads to a bizarre reunion between an officer and suspect, police respond to a domestic dispute, and officers respond to a suspicious vehicle in a local park.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A family gets a huge scare when a fleeing suspect finds his way into their house. Police sort out a chaotic argument between two childhood friends. A woman in a suspicious vehicle plays fast and loose with the truth.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Two suspects lead Officers on a high speed pursuit. An Officer discovers two men have warrants after a traffic stop. A man hides from the police after a domesitc disturbance call.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An inebriated man is arrested after getting caught peering through the window of a recovery center. After a foot chase officers bring down a well-known local felon. Police respond to a domestic dispute at a local mobile home park.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A generous boyfriend steps in to prevent his girlfriend from going to jail. Officers save a kitten who wants to hide in a dangerous place. A man says he’s been driving a stolen truck for one day, but he’s off by a few months.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers assist in rescuing a man from a rushing river. A suspect taunts officers during a slow speed chase. Officers assist a rescue team with the extraction of a man from his vehicle after a car wreck. An officer spots an apartment fire.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A trespassing suspect claims to be a federal informant, officers inspect an erratically driven car and find a safe, and a familiar face swears this time she's going to rehab.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect driving a stolen vehicle. A biohazard bin an illegal knife and drugs are found during a traffic stop. Agents go undercover in an area known for heavy drug activity.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A detective is injured after chasing a man driving a stolen car, a bar fight ends with a couple in handcuffs, and an officer finds a variety of items during a vehicle search.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a notorious New Jersey drug hotbed. Officers find a suspect hidden under a mattress. A bicycle thief is caught red handed.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A couple assaults a tow lot employee who won't release their car, a suspicious man catches a patrol's attention, and police detain a carload of suspected shoplifters.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An Oklahoma man's effort to evade units goes up in flames, officers use a beanbag gun on an armed suspect, and deputies intervene in a couple's grocery dispute.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A woman asks police to get involved after her ex threatened to destroy her home. Prior medical procedures drive a woman to find a dangerous way to ease her pain. Deputies search for a mysterious driver who fled a car crash.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A couple leaving a restaurant on their anniversary are killed in the street and their car is stolen. The crime scene is compromised when it rains shortly after the CSIs arrive.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The entire team investigates the abduction of the infant child of a well-to-do family. Suspicion immediately falls on the child's parents.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Two teenage girls run over a deaf man with their car, but they didn't kill him - he was already dead.

programme.title: CSI

programme.desc: Amador quiere casarse con sus novia. La jefa de la familia le pone una condición: Todas las hermanas mayores que ella tienen que casarse primero y por orden de edades. Siendo su novia la menor, Amador tiene que buscarles marido a todas sus cuñadas.

programme.title: Escuela para solteras

programme.title: El Quijote
programme.desc: Don Quijote lucha contra unos rebaños de ovejas pensando que son ejércitos, detiene una oscura procesión pensando que están poseídas y, más tarde, encuentran una cuerda de cautivos a los que Don Quijote libera.

programme.title: Los Cuatro Juanes

programme.title: Garras

programme.title: Tan distinto como yo
programme.desc: Del éxito de ventas del NY Times llega una historia inspiradora y verdadera sobre dos hombres de orígenes radicalmente opuestos, que desarrollan un sorprendente vínculo que los llevará al viaje más notable de sus vidas y forjará una amistad eterna.

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: “Amistad” es la historia de un motín en 1839 a bordo de un barco de esclavos que viaja a la costa noroeste de Estados Unidos. Gran parte de la historia tiene que ver con un drama judicial sobre el esclavo que lideró la rebelión.

programme.title: Find Me Guilty
programme.desc: Basada en la historia del gángster Jackie DiNorscio (Vin Diesel, 'Furious 7'), quien se representó a sí mismo en el juicio penal más largo de la historia de Estados Unidos. Con Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Soltera a los 30
programme.desc: Cuando Kate cumple 30 años, sus amigas Evie y Charlie se ofrecen a hacer una fiesta, pero la fiesta se sale de control.

programme.title: Treintona, soltera y fantástica
programme.desc: Una mujer en sus treinta y tantos años se descubre a sí misma a través de la vida, el amor y el corazón roto.

programme.title: La boda de Valentina
programme.desc: Valentina tiene la vida perfecta en Estados Unidos. Su universo tiembla cuando su novio Jason le propone matrimonio y debe enfrentar a su familia, “los perfectos Tate”, con la suya, “los Hidalgo”, la dinastía política más caótica de la historia de México.

programme.title: La Mexicana
programme.desc: Un hombre trata de llevar a través de la frontera una antigua pistola llamada La Mexicana, que se cree que está maldita, mientras su novia lo presiona para que abandone sus costumbres criminales.

programme.title: Just a Little Chemistry (Solo química)
programme.desc: Una fan se encuentra dividida entre la atracción por su ídolo del cine y su mejor amigo.

programme.title: La mejor Navidad
programme.desc: Gloria, enfocada en su trabajo en Miami después de su divorcio, envía a sus hijos a pasar la Navidad con su exmarido en Jalisco. Lo que no imaginan es que esta decisión les va a cambiar la vida.

programme.title: Cosas te tíos
programme.desc: Jason Lee interpreta a un ejecutivo en la ciudad de Seattle que se va a casar con la hija de su jefe (Selma Blair). Su vida se convierte en una pesadilla cuando no se acuerda si la engañó durante su despedida de soltero.

programme.title: Ejecutor
programme.desc: Despedido hace algún tiempo del FBI, Mark Kaminsky se pone en contacto con su anterior jefe, Shannon, cuyo hijo ha sido asesinado. Decidido a encontrar al asesino, Shannon necesita la ayuda de Kaminsky y se ofrece a reincorporarlo si tiene éxito.

programme.title: Enemigo al acecho
programme.desc: Dos francotiradores, uno ruso y uno alemán, juegan al gato y el ratón durante la Batalla de Stalingrado.

programme.title: Regreso al infierno
programme.desc: Cuando período de servicio en Irak llega a su fin, cuatro soldados estadounidenses se enteran de que están programados pare emprender una misión final. Una misión profética que cambiará eternamente el concepto que tenían hasta ahora de guerra.

programme.title: Rescate al amanecer
programme.desc: Durante la guerra de Vietnam, el piloto americano, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale) es derribado y tomado prisionero por el Vietcong. Durante su cautiverio, le tocó vivir una de las experiencias más notables y horrorosas de toda la guerra.

programme.title: Terminator: El exterminador
programme.desc: En 2029, las super-computadoras dominan el planeta y buscan exterminar la raza humana. Para ello, mandan de regreso en el tiempo a un indestructible cyborg con la misión de matar a Sarah Connor, cuyo hijo se convertirá en la esperanza de la humanidad.

programme.title: Cara o sello
programme.desc: Carlos Mendoza es un policía honesto. Cuando no acepta un soborno y encarcela a los culpables, despierta la ira de un narcotraficante local, que secuestra a su familia y lo hace elegir entre su familia, su carrera y su compañero.

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: EL campeón de kickboxing Eric Sloane es paralizado en el ring por el malvado Tong Po. El hermano menor de Eric, Kurt, busca venganza. Kurt aprende Muay-Thai del gurú de la pelea Xian Chow.

programme.title: Una última y nos vamos
programme.desc: Un grupo de mariachis salen de casa por primera vez para competir en un certamen nacional en la ciudad de México. Los 8 hombres tienen que soportar muchos desafíos, lo que parece ser una oportunidad de su vida, pronto podría conducir al final del grupo.

programme.title: Me late chocolate
programme.desc: Después de que su prometido muere inesperadamente, una mujer decide aceptar la vida y seguir su sueño de trabajar con chocolate.

programme.title: Todos queremos a alguien
programme.desc: Karla Souza interpreta a una joven doctora soltera en Los Ángeles quien está dividida entre dos amantes y dos posibles amores, en esta divertida comedia romántica bilingüe.

programme.title: La Novia
programme.desc: Desde pequeños, Leonardo, el novio, y la novia han formado un triángulo inseparable. Sin embargo, las cosas se complican cuando el novio y la novia deciden casarse.

programme.title: ¿Quién Diablos Es Juliette?
programme.desc: Es una historia verdadera, una ficción robada de la realidad, que comienza con el sorprendente paralelismo entre dos mujeres de piel dorada y ojos verdes: Juliette, una adolescente cubana, y Fabiola una modelo mexicana que vive en Manhattan.

programme.title: Música en espera
programme.desc: Un compositor y una mujer embarazada se ayudan el uno al otro para solucionar sus problemas.

programme.title: Ilusiones S.A.
programme.desc: Para hacer feliz a su mujer, un hombre contrata a una empresa que crea fantasías para fingir que su nieto, quien los dejó hace años, es un hombre de bien. Pero el verdadero nieto, quien es en realidad un delincuente, se aparece exigiendo dinero.

programme.title: Tierra de vampiros II
programme.desc: Tras el asesinato de su familia, Martin se adentra en las tierras baldías de Estados Unidos en busca de Mister con la esperanza de volver a asociarse con él para combatir una nueva amenaza de vampiros.

programme.title: Drácula 2000

programme.title: Sabor a sangre y chocolate
programme.desc: Adaptación del relato de la autora Annette Curtis Klause acerca de una joven loba adolescente, que debe elegir entre su amor por un joven humano muy lindo y honrar la lealtad de la manada.

programme.title: Tierra de vampiros
programme.desc: Estados Unidos es una nación perdida. Cuando se desata una epidemia de vampirismo y su familia es asesinada, el joven Martin (Connor Paolo) se vuelve el protegido de un canoso y obstinado cazador (Nick Damici) cuya nueva presa son los muertos vivientes.

programme.title: Tierra de vampiros II

programme.title: Duplex

programme.title: ¿Solo amigos?
programme.desc: Harto de malas relaciones, Wallace (Daniel Radcliffe), que abandonó su carrera de medicina, decide poner su vida amorosa en pausa. Tras enamorarse de Chantry (Zoe Kazan), una animadora que vive con su novio Ben (Rafe Spall), el "amor" se complica.

programme.title: Último viaje a Las Vegas

programme.title: Duplex
programme.desc: Los jóvenes y vibrantes neoyorquinos Alex y Nancy encontraron un lugar perfecto para establecerse y compartir un futuro brillante: la planta baja de un hermoso y viejo dúplex. Pero su nuevo hogar viene con un accesorio permanente que no esperaban.

programme.title: Dinero fácil

programme.desc: Tough-as-nails career Marine Sergeant John Stryker is greatly disliked by the men of his squad, particularly the combat replacements, for the rigorous training he puts them through.

programme.title: Island In The Sky

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer learns his face will be on a recruiting poster -- instead of Sgt. Carter's.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: A man-hungry woman Marine tries to split up Gomer and Lou-Ann.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: As Hogan tries to help a German scientist defect, bumbling Colonel Crittendon interferes again.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan wants Klink to forget about a promotion so he plays cupid for him and General Burkhalter's sister.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: There seems to be a traitor in the escaped prisoner pipeline and Hogan has to find him by following the escape route.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Carter receives a Dear John letter and wants to join the rest of the prisoners that escape and go home.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan tricks Klink into calling forth a bomber for study, but it arrives with a complication - a German general familiar with Hogan's style.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Klink reluctantly falls in with two other Kommandants plotting against Burkhalter. Burkhalter finds out. Now Hogan must step in before Stalag 13 loses Klink the military way - by firing squad.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan's operation is known to a Gestapo man who wants to trade his knowledge for $1,000,000 in diamonds, but can he be trusted?

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: While Lisa and Oliver consider what to do on their unplanned trip to Washington D.C., Mr. Haney rents their house to a family of eight. Meanwhile in the nation's capital, Lisa and Eb tour the White House, and Mr. Kimball makes official trouble.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When a charmingly sweet doe wanders onto the Douglas farm, an enchanted Lisa befriends the beautiful animal. Having had her heart won over, Lisa resolves to have all deer hunting banned in Hooterville, winning support however necessary.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Farmhand Eb plans to take his girlfriend to a fancy restaurant for her birthday. Only problem is he can't afford it. Oliver encourages Eb to get creative and figure out how to earn the money himself. And if Eb is anything, it's creative.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa becomes enchanted with the diary of a Lydia Plunkett. Found in an old trunk in the barn, the diary from 1898 tells Lydia's life story as a successful businesswoman. Eb and Lisa are glued to every page of the story, but Oliver isn't impressed.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Mr. Haney and Fred Ziffel try to persuade Oliver to invest in a new business venture. 'Looney Luke' Needlinger claim to have invented a machine that can turn hay into fresh milk. Oliver is skeptical and tries to prove the machine is a white lie.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When Oliver returns home with Arnold, the citizens in town hold a large reception for Arnold. But when Oliver receives a phone call from a lawyer representing an eccentric relative of the Birnbachers, the riches go into question.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Efforts to aid a Nazi general's assassination plan hit a snag when Schultz unknowingly activates a time bomb meant for the Führer.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: As the Hammelburg Underground lodges a complaint against Hogan's success, Klink finds himself caught between the Gestapo and the Wehrmacht, each trying to take over Stalag 13.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa's 'Mudder' pays a surprise visit to Lisa and Oliver. Eb good-naturedly introduces her as the Queen of Sicily. As a result, the entire town treats her like royalty. They even go so far as to hold a special day in her honor.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan is stymied over how to rescue a captured member of the underground until a potential diversion appears in the form of an old WWI buddy of Sgt. Schultz.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Arnold Ziffel, Hooterville's beloved swine is thought to have rightful claim to a $20,000 fortune. The Birnbacher pork empire has promised that the descendant of the famous weather-predicting pig, Herman, will inherit the vast sum.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Rusted-out plumbing collapses the emergency tunnel just as Hogan needs to get four Underground leaders out of Germany, so he creates a health spa.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: All goes well when Hogan's gang steals Klink's code book from his safe, photographs the contents, and returns it to its proper place. But there's a small hitch - Carter forgets to load the camera with film.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: When Newkirk discovers a new radio-controlled tank that could win the war for Germany, the allies want Hogan and the men to photograph the tank and then destroy it - but complications ensue during their mission.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: While trying to free the underground agent "Tiger" in Paris, Hogan must seek help from a Parisian fortune teller and also enlist the aid of a man who is a look-alike for Nazi Police Chief Heinrich Himmler!

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: With camp security raised, Hogan and his men are desperate to smuggle some top-secret plans of German fortifications to the Allies. The solution? Make liberal use of Carter's remarkable impersonation of Adolf Hitler.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: The aristocratic Colonel Klink fails a routine physical exam and lands a combat assignment at the Russian front! Fearing a hard-line replacement at Stalag 13, the men must do all they can to rescind Klink's marching papers.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Col. Hogan is less than thrilled when he is assigned to help an obnoxious American general flee Stalag 13 - and the secret plan, involving a prisoner swap, winds up as trying and difficult as the arrogant escapee himself.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Sweet's friends, the Tibbits, are an older couple that own a bookshop in Sparta. When Mrs. Tibbits is shot and killed during an apparent robbery, Gillespie and Tibbs question the suspicious circumstances around her death. Was her death planned?

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Virgil Tibbs is working hard to reunite his family, when he discovers that his aunt's son may be involved in a murder. Virgil is caught between hurting his aunt who loves her son and bringing justice to the town he works to protect every day.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: The owner of a local gym in Sparta, Kathleen Wheartly, tries to protect her delinquent brother, Jack, who is falsely accused of murder. She soon finds that her own life is in danger when a ruthless bounty hunter shows up in town, looking for Jack.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: It’s Christmastime and an eager journalist from the local Sparta Herald newspaper begs to interview the police force; however, when she twists their stories to fit her negative agenda, the officers learn a hard lesson about the power of the press.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Gillespie and Tibbs investigate a fatal car crash. The driver, Robbie Jeffries, suffered severe injuries in the accident, and his girlfriend Becky was killed. Everyone is surprised when the medical reports show Robbie may have been poisoned.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: A troubled teen from a broken home is suspected of shooting a friend's stepfather.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: A killer ends up working with a witness to their crime.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: Lieutenant Michael Stone and Inspector Steven Keller investigate the murder of women. The murderer was wearing an officer's uniform of the United States Air Force.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: Mike's former partner returns to San Francisco, but not because of any longing for the good old days. He is back in town to kill the hired gunman who murdered his son years before.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: A single .25 caliber pistol affects many lives in a single weekend.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Joey, a young man who helped Mannix out on a previous case, shows up in the detective's apartment, injured from a beating. Mannix hides Joey and gets a call out to the police just before the apartment is overrun by hoods.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix has taken up a new hobby, amateur auto racing. While participating in a race, another racer is killed when his car seems to lose control and goes over an embankment.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix finds a woman's husband was murdered in prison and another man killed shortly after visiting her, is connected with a 6 million dollar robbery.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: An author, preparing a book about a well-publicized murder case in a small California city, is killed when his yacht blows up. The author's publisher hires Mannix to find the book's last chapter, which is said to solve the murder case.

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder

programme.desc: En el estreno de la serie Archivos Forenses (Forensic Files), la serie de crímenes reales más extensa de la historia, una asistente de vuelo de Connecticut desaparece. La policía sospecha que su esposo es culpable de asesinato, pero ¿pueden comprobarlo?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una fría noche de Diciembre de 1993, Rose Larner se detuvo en una tienda cuando se dirigía a la casa de su novio. Nunca más se la vio ni se supo de ella.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Un recuerdo conmovedor
programme.desc: Una niña inteligente de Visalia, California recuerda dejar huellas dactilares en el vehículo de su secuestrador cuando es secuestrada, lo que ayuda a la policía en su búsqueda junto con una huella de neumático en el barro.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Robert Sims regresa a casa después de trabajar en el turno de noche y encuentra a su esposa inconsciente en el piso de la cocina. Su hijo está profundamente dormido en una habitación de arriba, pero su hija de seis semanas, Heather, no está.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Pistas de elefante
programme.desc: Los asesinatos de una pareja de ancianos dejan a la policía perpleja hasta que, dos años después, reciben un gran alivio.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La policía obtiene una pista sobre una pareja que desapareció en el fin de semana del Día de los Caídos durante un robo en marcha. La evidencia que se encuentra resuelve el brutal crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Huellas entre ladrones
programme.desc: El asesinato de un excéntrico millonario no fue del todo inesperado; alardeaba de su riqueza y se preocupaba poco por la seguridad personal.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando una mujer desaparece, los amigos y familia se proponen encontrarla. Sus peores miedos se confirman semanas después cuando se descubre su cuerpo.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: After an unusual online audition process, the rookie candidates for the 2020 squad move into an isolated training camp bubble amid the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The 20 rookies try to master a socially distanced version of the famous kick line and some intricate choreography, and Kelli helps the ladies get fitted for uniforms.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Guest choreographers test the rookies with new routines, the veterans arrive at camp determined to earn back their spots, and country star Mickey Guyton has inspiring words for the hopefuls.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The pressure's on for rookies and vets as the hopefuls head to the stadium for their first field rehearsal, and Kelli and Judy must decide which women won't move on in training camp.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The rookies outshine the veterans when choreographer Travis Wall teaches a sexy dance number, and Kelli and Judy give some of the vets a wake-up call.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The dancers get a chance to showcase their unique talents during show group auditions, and Kelli and Judy deliberate with guest judges to select the elite squad.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The dancers test their ability to think on their toes during a series of mock-press interviews, and as auditions wind down, a shocking bit of news shakes up the process for Kelli and Judy.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy make cuts via video chat after a positive test for COVID-19 halts camp, Charlotte Jones hands out the iconic uniforms, and the team performs its game-day entrance.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With nine cuts looming before the team's first game, the hopefuls show off their freestyle dancing, get fit for their official uniforms and learn new choreography from Denise Dicharry.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Choreographer Criscilla Anderson uses her cancer battle to inspire the dancers, veteran mentors offer style tips to the rookies, and Travis Wall helps Judy and Kelli make their next cut.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley and Jimmy's eight-month anniversary is coming up - and so is the question of whether or not to have sex. Paige is playing Juliet opposite Jimmy's English-class Romeo and she's planting doubts in Ashley's mind.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jimmy desperately wants to make the basketball team. But, surprisingly, it looks like Sean is surpassing him as a possible star player.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After a long absence overseas, Ashley's dad is back in town. She's enjoying his company and attention, but something tells her there's a piece of his life that's being kept from her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Lacking real family time at home, Jimmy has been spending more and more time at Ashley's house. He and Toby are like brothers and Kate's begun referring to him as her "third kid".

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Recently diagnosed with a learning disorder, an embarrassed Liberty is ashamed to tell her friends about her tutoring sessions. Emma sees one of Liberty's private sessions and, putting two-and-two together with Liberty's suspicious behaviour, asks J.T.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Sean asks Emma what she's doing tonight, Emma's thrilled - that's a date, right? But nervous Sean is unable to muster the courage to arrange the details and Emma misunderstands his hesitancy as rejection.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Paige decides to start a Spirit Squad at Degrassi, Emma can't believe that the "sexist" sport of cheerleading is being revived. But Manny, who's had years of gymnastics training and is desperate for something to help make her "cool

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley's convinced that she and Terri are going to be the stars of the school talent show, singing her new (and incredibly earnest) ballad. Terri would rather add Paige -- and some fun sparkle -- to the act, but she's not sure how to tell Ashley that.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Faced with the pressure of passing Grade 7 on his second time around and his mother's newest threat to take him back to his unhappy life up north, Sean is beginning to slip into old, angry patterns.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Perfect Ashley is beginning to bore even herself. With their parents away for the weekend, Ashley decides to join Toby in breaking the "one-guest-each" rule and invites Paige and Hazel to join her and Terri.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Summer's over and the Degrassi kids are back…in droves. A neighbouring high school has been amalgamated with the Junior High and things are a bit of a zoo.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Summer's over and the Degrassi kids are back…in droves. A neighbouring high school has been amalgamated with the Junior High and things are a bit of a zoo.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Spike reveals the identity of the mystery man she's been dating, Emma is shocked. Mr. Simpson - her teacher! Emma claims she’s okay with it, but if that’s true, why is suddenly being so rude to Mr. Simpson?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley feels like an outcast. Nobody's willing to forget how she treated them at her party last year. Ash decides to take action, swallows her pride and apologizes to everyone. And it works. She boasts to Terri about her success- it’s like last year

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It's Science Fair time at Degrassi. Emma’s a serious contender for first prize, but when the results of her experiment don't fall in line with her hypothesis, she's in a panic.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Joey is going away for the weekend with his latest girlfriend, and Craig is surprised when Joey tells him he can stay on his own – and even have the guys over! When the guys get to Craig’s for the weekend, they can’t think of much to do

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Degrassi Panthers have a new star soccer player, Spinner. His victory’s even sweeter when Paige agrees to a movie. When the losing team's defensive back, the gorgeous Dean, invites a smitten Paige to a house party, she cancels on Spinner.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Haunted by memories of her recent sexual assault, Paige is desperately trying to appear normal. A girl band contest sounds like a great distraction. Terri wants to reunite PMS—including Ashley. Paige refuses and recruits Hazel instead.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Toby is tired of being an invisible computer geek so he decides to join a sports team. Girls love wrestlers - that includes Toby’s crush Kendra. To Toby's dismay, the few extra pounds he carries put him in the same weight class as athletic Sean.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny’s crush on Craig has reached huge proportions and everyone’s urging her to ask him out already! But Manny’s a romantic; she thinks the guy ought to do the asking

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Grade Nine International Day is coming up and Hazel isn’t thrilled. After all, Hazel’s Jamaican and everybody loves the islands - right? When the day arrives, Hazel’s display is a hit, but she isn’t acting like herself.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma Nelson is reveling in her newest job as her mom's maid of honour and planner extraordinaire! Her mom, Spike, is marrying her high-school crush, Snake - who also just happens to be Emma's favourite teacher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma Nelson is reveling in her newest job as her mom's maid of honour and planner extraordinaire! Her mom, Spike, is marrying her high-school crush, Snake - who also just happens to be Emma's favourite teacher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco and Ellie are the best of friends. But Ellie is starting to want more…Marco though can’t seem to respond in kind. He’s more and more confused about what and who he’s looking for…

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When class clown JT acts up in Science class, his teacher Ms. Hatzilakos gives him a serious detention - assisting her with the guinea pigs all week. JT’s annoyed.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Things are looking up for Sean. He and Emma are back together. He’s a star on the basketball team. And he and Jimmy have buried the hatchet. Jimmy’s even invited him to a party. But the good feelings don’t last for long.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Liberty can’t believe it when she doesn’t make the Girls Floor Hockey team – she’s never failed at anything. So when Coach Hatzilakos asks her to be the Team Manager, Liberty throws all her energy into managing.

programme.title: Living with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: David Attenborough learns that descendants of the dinosaur age are alive and well. David explores how they survived the catastrophes that wiped out other species.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David travels the world to unravel some of the wonders and puzzles of palaeontology. But how do you find the world's oldest and rarest reptile?

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: Could pterodactyls fly? And why did trilobites have such good eyes? David Attenborough investigates the secret lives of animals from the past, as told in the fossil record.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers dinosaur bones in the Sahara desert and visits the biggest, most spectacular dinosaur displays in the world.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers bizarre creatures of the earliest seas, tiny horses the size of spaniels and an animal that's half bird and half reptile - the rarest of them all.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The evolution of the predators who lived 550 million years ago, and how the first amphibians migrated from sea to land.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Three hundred million years ago, the forests were ruled by insects. This was a world in which giant dragonflies battled with two-foot-wide spiders.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: On the supercontinent Pangea, early therapsids, creatures more similar to mammals than reptiles, fight for survival alongside other animals. In the carboniferous swamps, insects and arthropods take over and grow into giants.

programme.title: How to Build a Dinosaur
programme.desc: Dinosaurs died out 65 million years ago and we have hardly ever found a complete skeleton. So how do we turn a pile of broken bones into a dinosaur exhibit? Dr Alice Roberts finds out how the experts put skeletons back together.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: This episode explains how the 120-million-year reign of the dinosaurs ended when mammals became the fastest and fiercest creatures on the planet.

programme.title: The Making Of: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Animatronics, computer animation and science re-create the dinosaurs' world.

programme.title: The Mystery of Rome's X Tomb
programme.desc: Dr Michael Scott investigates the secrets of a tomb containing over 2,000 bodies in one of the catacombs of Rome.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino-den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus, an animal so large that even its poo was deadly.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic was home to the most vicious and violent predators the world has ever seen. To survive, herbivores had to fight back. Steve Backshall goes on a mission to track down the deadliest of all dinosaur defenders.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve tries to chomp through a car like a T-rex, wield an axe like an Allosaurus and hitch a ride in Britain's biggest tank to showcase the might of a Spinosaurus.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve gets freaky on a mission to find the weirdest dinosaur ever. He kick-starts with a Gigantoraptor, an 8 metre tall giant that laid the biggest eggs in history.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve discovers just what it takes to be a terror from the skies. He straps himself into one of Britain's fastest wind tunnels where he goes head to head against Microraptor.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve travels to new depths as he discovers just what it takes to be an aquatic terror. His quest sees him rocket through water in spectacular style, just like an Opthalmosaurus.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve's on a mission to find dinosaurs that have something a little special: fearsome killers, with incredible abilities! Get ready for a sensory sensation! His quest sees him race in the dark like a Troodon.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve goes on an undercover mission to unearth the sneakiest dinosaurs that were far deadlier than they first appeared.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog kick-starts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail, leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.desc: Dr. Greg is unhappy that the group returns to work after their night out hung over and with a new awkwardness between Niven and Charlotte. As a punishment, he puts the group to task cleaning the clinic.

programme.title: New Life: Born to Swim
programme.desc: It's a water world and life couldn't survive without it. And thanks to it, a mind blowing diversity of creatures thrive beneath the surface.

programme.title: EXTRAORDINARY HUMANS
programme.desc: Thom Hunt meets a man who claims to have a skull capable of withstanding extreme forces; Li Xin demonstrates this by performing a headstand on the tip of a nine-inch nail.

programme.title: Jungle Planet
programme.desc: The huge expanses of olive groves around the Mediterranean region are a humanized forest where trees grow in an orderly manner.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost is offered an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level; Tommy reunites with Tasha in a scheme, while he also attempts to keep a contact under control.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost is spread even thinner between Angela, the children, business and Tommy as the opportunity to expand the clubs evolves; Tommy struggles with a decision, Kanan re-enters the life; Angela has doubts.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Tommy searches for the person who tried to kill him; Ruiz is pressured by Greg to give up the true Ghost, while Angela attempts to keep them away; Proctor tells Ghost that he may have a new problem.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost and Tommy reunite to take out a dangerous enemy and enlist Tasha to help them escape detection by Angela and her team; Ghost loses control at a critical moment.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Angela reels after her breakup and faces difficult questions at work; Ghost scrambles to keep the club deal alive as he and Tommy are forced to re-enter the game; Dre learns the meaning of the La Arana card.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Mike and Angela hunt for the mole; Angela gets a lead, while she must solidify Tommy's alibi; Tasha receives a warning as Tariq makes a dangerous new friend; Milan issues an edict to push a new product.

programme.desc: Nicole, Jess and Antonio investigate the disappearance of a man from the federal witness protection program.

programme.title: 1-800-Missing
programme.desc: Nicole goes under cover to investigate a dangerous arms-dealer.

programme.title: 1-800-Missing

programme.title: A que no puedes
programme.desc: Emocionante juego que enfrenta a dos equipos de celebridades en su intento por realizar pruebas y retos únicos. El equipo que complete con éxito la tarea, ganará dinero para una obra de ayuda social.

programme.desc: The Keatons consider buying a gun for protection after getting burglarized.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Seduced by an "older woman" of twenty-one, the hitherto inexperienced Alex is devastated to learn that she thinks of their relationship as casual.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: A visit from Steven's father evokes confrontation between the two.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: To the dismay of the Keaton children and their equally conservative grandparents, Steven and Elyse take time out Thanksgiving Day to attend an anti-nuke rally-and end up spending the holiday in jail.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Soon after freelance architect Elyse Keaton hires her friend Suzanne Davis to handle clerical chores, she wants to fire the under-qualified, overly aggressive secretary.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Though Alex loves working at Mr. Adler's "Mom and Pop" grocery store, to the old man's dismay, he quits to "climb the corporate ladder" at an ultramodern supermarket.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Mallory is horrified and confused when a close family friend and older business associate of her father makes a pass at her.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: As the new editor of his school paper, Alex uncovers a cheating scandal and to everyone's chagrin, prints a list of students who were caught including Mallory.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: When a blizzard forces the Keatons to spend Christmas at home, Elyse's gift to Steven an album filled with fascinating old photos sparks flashbacks to the births of their three children.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: When popular sorority girl Sherry Marshall befriends Mallory to get close to Alex, Mallory brings them together in hopes of joining Pi Nu but her plan backfires.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: Elyse's younger brother and Alex's idol, Ned, makes a surprise visit. However, everyone is puzzled by the go-getter corporate executive's suspicious behavior.

programme.title: Family Ties
programme.desc: With the FBI hot on Ned's heels for embezzling 4.5 million dollars in corporate funds, Elyse's ethical brother and Alex's idol tells the family why and where he hid the money.

programme.title: Family Ties

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El edificio Pino es desalojado por causas de fuerza mayor y todos tienen que buscar donde vivir, mientras que el Abuelo se deja caer en una espiral descendente debido a su gran ego.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar cansado de la ineficiencia y corrupción decide postularse como servidor público, mientras que Irma es grabada en una situación incómoda, convirtiéndose en una celebridad.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2

programme.title: Counting Cars

programme.title: Counting Cars

programme.title: Counting Cars

programme.title: Counting Cars

programme.title: Counting Cars

programme.title: Counting Cars

programme.title: Counting Cars

programme.title: The F Word (UK)
programme.desc: Gordon is joined by four farmer’s daughters who believe they can thrive in his kitchen. Gordon and his brigade cook crab mayonnaise rolls with mango salsa, a succulent beef fillet with mushroom gratin and Gordon’s favourite dessert - hot chocolate fondant

programme.title: The F Word (UK)

programme.title: Mexico: One Plate at a Time with Rick Bayless
programme.desc: At Hartwood restaurant, Chef Eric Werner explains the fascinating farm-to-table supply chain that provides Hartwood's live-fire kitchen with fresh ingredients. The rustic simplicity inspires Rick to shop for produce and cook up a storm.

programme.title: Mexico: One Plate at a Time with Rick Bayless
programme.desc: In the Yucatan, cooking over fire is a way of life, and Chefs Juan Pablo Loza, Federico Lopez, and Eric Werner demonstrate their mastery cooking with flame. Back at Lena Brava in Chicago, Rick prepares spatchcock chicken al oregano.

programme.title: Mexico: One Plate at a Time with Rick Bayless
