programme.title: Mexico: One Plate at a Time with Rick Bayless

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati explores the culinary highlights of Jalisco’s capital city, Guadalajara. She starts at a street cart to taste the city’s most iconic sandwich, tortas ahogadas. Then, she meets one of the city’s best chefs, Fabian Delgado.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Guadalajara is the cultural epicenter of Jalisco, drawing some of the most creative artists, musicians and chefs from all over Mexico. Pati explores some unique spots where food and art truly connect. In her kitchen.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati stops at a couple of beloved restaurants in Guadalajara for two classic dishes. At Super Menuderia Cano, she learns the secrets to their menudo that’s so good people line up down the block waiting to get in.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table

programme.desc: La venganza contra los Elizondo está en peligro, Juan se enfrenta con sus propios sentimientos. Sara y Jimena son invitadas al bar, mientras Rosario recibe una noticia al terminar su show.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan entra sin permiso en la habitación de Norma y la besa, él queda asombrado por su reacción. Gabriela acuerda el noviazgo de sus hijas menores con los sobrinos de su amiga Raquel.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Fernando busca intimidad con Norma, ella solo piensa en Juan. Sarita le dice a Jimena que no se meta en su decisión de comprometerse con Leandro y le explica sus intenciones a Franco.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan y Norma tienen un encuentro apasionado y se citan fuera de la hacienda. Gabriela confía ciegamente en Fernando, le da dinero para una supuesta inversión con su amigo Armando.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Eloísa inventa una serie de chismes Michelle. Ante su desaparición, Hugo decide ir tras ella, pero nadie se imagina lo que va a suceder con Aurora mientras él sale de viaje.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Alcides se defiende y le asegura a Soledad, a Esther y a Boris que no tiene a la niña, mientras que Aurora es abandonada a su suerte en la cabaña para que incriminen a Alcides.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Daniel propone impedir la entrada de los hermanos Medina en casa de los Obregón. Hugo se opone, mientras Alcides tiene una idea para convencerlos a todos de la partida de Michelle.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Soledad recibe una importante noticia del juez y Lucas pide que se investigue quién secuestró a su nieta. Antonia acepta ser pianista en el taberna, se disfraza para que no la reconozcan.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Irene le pide perdón a Verónica y horas más tarde recibe una carta de Gabriela donde dice: “Te perdono”. Constanza quiere demostrar que Antonia es cómplice de Aníbal Villegas. El senador tiene las cuentas congeladas. Guerra prepara una coartada.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Irene le pide perdón a Gabriela y se ofrece para reparar el daño, atestiguando en contra de Antonia. Lagarto también podría ser un testigo clave. Ricardo hace el amor con Inés y les toman fotografías. Patricia recibe las fotos y llora de rabia.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Patricia hace un discurso memorable contra Antonia y despierta la admiración de todos. Aníbal pronto estará de alta, pero le ofrece dinero al médico para que lo deje en el hospital. Lucho Vampa le roba a Antonia y Rodrigo corta relaciones con ella.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Alejandro golpea con una rabia descontrolada a Macario y termina en la comisaría. Por ahora, no podrá salir de prisión. Constanza y Gastón encuentran un sobre con la llave de una bóveda de un banco y una tarjeta electrónica con la foto de Antonia.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan y Norma tienen un encuentro apasionado y se citan fuera de la hacienda. Gabriela confía ciegamente en Fernando, le da dinero para una supuesta inversión con su amigo Armando.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Gabriela le pide a Sarita que atienda a su hermana Norma, al verla muy nerviosa. Franco se enfada cuando se entera de la boda apresurada de Jimena, ella encuentra la forma de calmarlo.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's favorite charity is having an auction--so Morticia persuades her family to part with things to sell. Donations include Wednesday's headless doll, the old flogging table, a stuffed vulture and Uncle Fester's dynamite.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final four teams travel to South Korea where they battle it out on water and ice to make the final three.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final three teams soar to new heights over Southern California, competing in the final leg for a shot at the million-dollar prize and, for two teams, the chance to become the first ever all-female team to win the series.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Eleven former Teams who fell short of winning the $1 million prize during their first Race around the globe will return for another shot.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams dressed as kangaroos continue through Australia where one Racer reverts to old habits as tempers start to flare, and another Team breaks down in tears from utter exhaustion.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: While in Japan, one team's hopes are shattered after a car crash jolts them to the back of the pack, and Racers get down and dirty in a pile of frigid mud.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The nine remaining teams depart from Commodore Perry's Landing in Kurihama, Japan and travel to their next destination in a race around the world for one million dollars.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The pressure builds when a prehistoric Roadblock pushes one Racer over the edge and a Double U-turn causes panic among the teams as they race to avoid elimination.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by a swarming sea of people on the congested streets of India, one team narrowly dodges a traffic collision while another's clumsiness threatens to spoil their chances of acing the Detour.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by the crowded streets of India, one team makes a costly blunder while another Racer takes a desperate plunge.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Confronted by a psychological Detour, teams try to avoid making a Freudian slip in the slick streets of Austria, and a hefty meal proves to be too big for some teams' stomachs.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The stress of the Race begins to take its toll when a Double U-Turn is revealed, and one Team struggles to consume a local delicacy while others become acquainted with Swiss hospitality.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams brave bone-chilling temperatures as they come face-to-face with the world famous Matterhorn, and tempers flare in the most intense argument of the season.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The final four Teams mix it up in Brazil where Racers cry out in pain during a hairy situation as this season comes down to a race to the finish line when one Team will be crowned the winners and receive the 1 million dollar prize.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The Emmy Award-winning The Amazing Race sets off for a new global adventure as Teams depart for Taipei, Taiwan. Plus, one team's position in the game is put in serious jeopardy when they lose their passport less than an hour into the Race.

programme.desc: Guest star Howard Morris plays the part of a mountain man very disgruntled with being rejected by the army.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee is the unwilling object of matrimony when mountaineer Briscoe Darling comes a'courting.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Ron Howard's real-life father and younger brother appear as Mayberry gets involved with a gold shipment en route to Fort Knox.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie seems in line for a new bicycle as he comes home with an all A report card.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney Fife plays cupid for Gomer when Barney's girl refuses to go to a dance unless her cousin also has a date.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney is evicted from his rooming house for illegal cooking and moves into the Mayberry sheriff's office backroom much to Andy's chagrin.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney tickets Gomer for a U-turn and is then detained in a citizen's arrest by Gomer for the same thing.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney organizes a rescue party when Andy and Helen are trapped in a cave by a landslide.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie learns a lesson in friendship when he befriends a newcomer to Mayberry.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee stirs up a crusade for a chicken farmer whose property has been condemned to make way for a new road.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney adds a vintage motorcycle to the rolling stock of the Mayberry Sheriff's department, to the Sheriff's regret.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A beautiful prisoner threatens to crumble the security of the Mayberry jail, as both Andy and Barney fall for her charms.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Otis Campbell acquires a car and threatens life and limb of Mayberry's pedestrian population.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney suffers an ego blow when Gomer out-sings him for a part in the Mayberry Choir. Andy Griffith's wife, Barbara, appears in this episode as a member of the singing group.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney disguises himself as a dummy in an attempt to solve a series of theft at the Mayberry department store.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy takes a week off, leaving Barney and Gomer in charge. A prisoner also takes off in the resultant confusion.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Feel the soft coolness of late summer air and drink in the beauty of changing colors with Bob Ross as he creates this refreshing masterpiece.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: A perfect oval composition! Come along with Bob Ross and see a secluded cottage with wild daisies and birch trees near a small woodland pond.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: A gentle bubbling stream in the midst of the forest - Bob Ross invites you to share the serenity of Nature's escape with this delightful painting.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Glide into this scenic world of green trees and bushes reflecting into calm waters. Bob Ross paints both gentle beauty and almighty power.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross travels with his paintbrushes into the density of an evening grove and discovers the beauty of a gentle, hushed rippling river.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Nicholas Hankins: Bob Ross' Unfinished Season
programme.desc: The soothing sounds of a cascading waterfall come to mind in this charming Bob Ross landscape.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: It's almost fall, and Bob Ross captures the undaunted power and charm of a mighty brown mountain surveying its rustic surroundings.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Relax with Bob Ross as the perfect picnic spot emerges from his paint filled brushes - quiet peaks on a tranquil lake and luscious green velvety grass.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross takes us home to the farm -- a big red barn and a long rickety wooden fence - capturing our very vivid childhood memories.

programme.desc: Find yourself in a gorgeous late-afternoon mountain masterpiece by Bob Ross -- breathtaking purples skies, defined evergreens, and smooth lake.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.desc: Alicia enlists Cary as her lawyer when Nelson Dubeck approaches her to participate in a deposition regarding his investigation into election rigging. Meanwhile, Will continues the difficult defense of Jeffrey Grant.

programme.title: The Good Wife
programme.desc: Alicia searches for answers as she tries to make sense of Will's death in the aftermath of the courthouse shooting. Meanwhile, Diane delivers the somber news to the partners at Lockhart/Gardner who must decide how to move forward.

programme.title: The Good Wife
programme.desc: Alicia and Diane consider merging their firms in the wake of Will's death, even as they find themselves on opposite sides of a contentious divorce suit. Meanwhile, Alicia offers assistance to Finn.

programme.title: The Good Wife
programme.desc: Florrick/Agos takes on the case of an NSA whistleblower, only to learn that the agency has been monitoring the firm as well as Alicia's personal life. Meanwhile, Diane faces the difficult task of working alongside Louis Canning.

programme.title: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Mike Kresteva (Matthew Perry) takes his case against Reddick, Boseman & Kolstad to a grand jury, but the firm devises a grand jury strategy of their own to hamper Kresteva's efforts. Series finale streaming only on Paramount+ on 9/8.

programme.title: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Founding partner, Carl Reddick, makes a surprise return to the firm. A renowned pastor needs the firm's help in a legal matter that threatens to ruin his legacy. Lucca unexpectedly meets Colin's parents. Series finale streaming only on Paramount+ on 9/8.

programme.title: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Diane and Adrian find themselves involved in another police brutality case, this time representing a surprising but familiar face, Colin Sweeney. Series finale streaming only on Paramount+ on 9/8.

programme.title: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Diane takes on a new client who is accused of cyber-terrorism, resulting in unforeseen repercussions for the firm, especially Lucca. An accident brings Diane and Kurt together. Henry reveals new truths about the scandal to Maia.

programme.title: The Good Fight
programme.desc: An unfortunate event brings the firm together, along with the prospect of a new partner, Liz Reddick-Lawrence. Meanwhile, Diane struggles with the insanity of the world. Series finale streaming only on Paramount+ on 9/8.

programme.title: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Tensions remain high when the firm learns another Chicago lawyer has been murdered by a client. Liz has her first day at Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart and positions herself as a potential ally for Diane. Series finale streaming only on Paramount+ on 9/8.

programme.title: The Good Wife
programme.desc: When Alicia pays a visit to longtime client Colin Sweeney, she finds herself in the unwanted role of witness when a body is discovered in his home.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi trek into Rwanda's forest to see Colobus monkeys with their famous black-and-white markings, and hike a volcanic island filled with fruit bats.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he embarks on a safari through Florida's Everglades, where he comes face-to-face with alligators and rattlesnakes. And, a rare look at the Native American traditions of the Seminole Tribe.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for an adventure to Santa Cruz Island where he visits the mating grounds of giant Galapagos Tortoises. Then he dives into the Pacific Ocean for an encounter with Galapagos Penguins and Sea Turtles.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack gets a special behind-the-scenes look at a retirement home for chimpanzees where caregivers have rescued over 250 chimps that now live in large family groups on specially designed islands in Florida.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Panama's coastal town of Pedasi is a haven for sea creatures. Jack encounters a nesting Sea Turtle, before visiting Isla Iguana where he searches for Black Iguanas, a colony of Frigate Birds, and a whole lot more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack explores the unique ecosystems of Panama! The Central American country's lush rainforests, pristine valleys, and spectacular seas are home to rare creatures like bats, sloths, sea turtles, and poison dart frogs.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In South Africa, Jack checks out the endangered species breeding program at Sable Ranch. Jack's ranch adventures include a helicopter round up of sable and roan antelope, as well as the trans-location of a white rhino.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In Costa Rica, Jack treks through the pristine Corcovado National Park in search of the elusive jaguar. On a night hike, Jack comes face-to-face with the tapir, a rainforest relative of the rhinoceros.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In South Africa, Jack and his daughter Kathleen undergo ranger training at the Sabi Sabi Game Reserve, they learn to track elephants to a water hole and encounter lions, cheetahs, and leopards.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wet & Wild
programme.desc: Bring your towel along for today’s wet and wild adventure! From the biggest fish in the sea, the whale shark, to sea lions, sperm whales, tiger sharks, and more. Find out which is number one, as Jack becomes your guide to the mysteries of the deep!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack trades his safari suit for a wet suit as he dives in with bottle-nosed dolphins! Jack and Sue, get more than they bargained for as they go along for the ride with dolphins on their daily outing into the open ocean.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Camouflage Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack as he’s counting down ten of his favorite encounters with the masters of camouflage.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he reveals how to tell the difference between some commonly confused creatures, like Cheetahs and Leopards, Crocs and Gators, Penguins and Puffins, Turtles and Tortoises and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Hanna Detective Agency
programme.desc: Today, Jungle Jack is putting his detective skills to the test to solve six mysteries from the animal kingdom. A disappearing civet in Borneo, a missing elephant in Kenya, a bat de-coding investigation in Panama, and several more mysterious mammals!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: You're Endangered, Baby
programme.desc: What does it take to save a species from extinction? Patience, education and lots of babies! Today, Jungle Jack is counting down six endangered species surviving against all odds -- one baby at a time.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for a cold-blooded countdown! Crocodiles, Puff Adders, Sea Turtles, Caiman, Fer de Lance and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack's heading back to school! Join in as he meets up with the zookeepers of tomorrow at the Santa Fe Teaching Zoo in Gainesville, Fla. where he gets a lesson in training a kookaburra, shifting a trio of Galapagos tortoises, and a whole lot more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join the Hanna family as they literally see-through this species, release an endangered sea turtle and learn just how important bats are to the ecosystem…and to inspecting Jack's hair!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Baby, You're the Greatest
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is going more than a little baby crazy! Today, cute and cuddly creatures guaranteed to make you smile. A darling orangutan, wee little warthogs, a sleeping baby bear and more cuteness than you can count!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and his family are heading to the quaint Danish town of Solvang, California! Join Jack and Julie as they get down and dirty at Lil Orphan Hammies, an amazing rescue center for pigs of all shapes and sizes.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In southern Brazil, Jack and Kathaleen boat up a raging river to Iguassu Falls, the world's largest. At the base of the falls, dad and daughter marvel at the unusual nesting site for thousands of Swifts.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack travels to Rwanda where he meets up with some old friends and makes some new ones. Join Jack and his family as they encounter extremely rare golden monkeys while trekking through the jungle in search of endangered mountain gorillas.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he counts down some of the weirdest, wackiest and wildest animal behaviors on the planet.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Just outside the city of Santiago, Chile there are people working to conserve and protect their native wildlife. Join Jack as he meets up with a family who started out taking in abandoned pets and ended up running a rehab center for rescued primates.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Top Dogs
programme.desc: This countdown is going to the dogs! Come along for seven of Jack’s favorite dog days from a lifetime of walking, chasing, and playing with human’s best friend.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Get ready for the trek of a lifetime, deep into the forests of Gabon, as Jack searches for elusive lowland Gorillas!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In the chilly waters of Shark Alley near the tip of South Africa, Jack seeks out the fearsome great white shark. Submerged in a metal cage, Jack's encounter with a 14-foot great white is the experience of a lifetime.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Years after a murder has been committed, investigators use advanced DNA analysis to shed new light on crimes that have gone unpunished for far too long.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Arson Investigation: Insurance torchings, mob burnouts and arson murders: these crimes are designed to take all clues with them. But a solid case can be built from a heap of ashes.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Explosives Investigations: The crime lab is the place where science meets murder. In New York State, Eleanor Fowler opened a small package, which as mailed to her home. When she lifted the lid the box exploded killing her instantly.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drug trafficking has spawned a violent and deadly criminal underground. It's providing a challenge to forensic investigators devoted to cracking drug rings.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A southeastern Virginia community is stunned by a crime no one can believe. A pregnant woman murdered, her baby lost. Across the state, another town feels a similar shock, a brutal, random slaying in a most unexpected setting.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For some killers, murder can be a profitable business. And the scene of the crime can be both a source for clues, and puzzling questions. When a victim has been targeted for death, investigators must look beyond the obvious to uncover a murder for hire.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Poisoners are the most devious of killers, relying on stealth or their victim's trust in order to steal their lives. They're the most dangerous creatures in the world: smart assassins. And they usually don't stop at one kill.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people do get away with murder, at least for a while. Flush with their success, serial killers murder again and again. But each time they kill, they leave behind a few more clues, which ultimately lead to their undoing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When victims of murder know their killers, they are often caught off guard. But even the best-laid plans leave traces of the forsaken trust.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Psychological Profiling: Journey into the dark recesses and calculated madness present only in our worst nightmares…and in the minds of serial killers.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators are always on the cutting edge of new forensic techniques that can help them solve cases more accurately. An experimental “brain fingerprinting” technique has already won the acquittal of a police officer accused of a drug charge.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The show examines cases of poison and deadly chemistry and shows how forensic experts are solving mysterious deaths today and from the past.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Profiles the work of world-renowned forensic experts and the procedures they use to solve murders and other mysteries in minutes or centuries after they happen.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: At the scene of a murder, sometimes the victim provides the only clues to their killer. Forensic anthropologists use skeletal remains to decipher the clues written in the bones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An assassination plot unfolds as four gunmen disguised as cavalrymen enter North Fork. Their target: Sen. Jim Borden. Their weapon: a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sharpshooter Marty Blair tries to persuade Lucas to buy Mark a rifle. After Lucas shoots a man during a robbery at the hotel, Mark and Lucas disagree with his character.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Fast-draw artist Wade Randall is in town, bragging of his gun battles with notorious bad men until one of them shows up to challenge his story.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Lucas refuses to sell his land, Mr. Prescott will stop at nothing to change his mind. He hires men to try to persuade Lucas, but he refuses.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark's careless actions cause the death of a friend. Unable to accept the truth, he blames the rifle and runs away from home. Soon, he is faced with a tough decision.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Nils Swenson takes the marshal's place for a few days while Micah is away. To maintain peace, Nils insists that anyone coming into town must turn in their weapons.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas's self-confidence begins to slip away when he misses an easy shot that could have cost Mark his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A murder occurs at a railroad camp and a young Indian friend of Lucas is accused of the killing. When Lucas tries to help the boy, he finds himself on trial.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark come upon Winslow Quince, a peddler whose wagon has broken down. They help him bring his wagon to North Fork for repair.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gridley Mau, the son of a man Lucas killed during an attempted robbery, comes to North Fork looking for revenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The first railroad train is coming to the new North Fork station. Onboard is a Japanese nobleman and his servant, visiting the West to learn about the United States.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: At Halloween, rustlers take advantage of the seasonal disguises to raid a cattle ranch. Lucas' faith in his son's honesty is shaken when he hears rumors of Mark being mixed up with the thieves.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Lucas run into Micah on the trail and help when the prisoner he is transporting injures his arm. Lucas' life is endangered when a snake crawls into his bed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Mark goes hunting for Old Spike, Lucas goes hunting for his mortal enemy. Lucas is thrown into jail to stop him from murdering his former friend.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is baffled when the marshal of a neighboring town refuses to hold a gambler who just attempted murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark is injured in an accident, leaving his legs paralyzed. At the doctor's suggestion, Lucas and Mark set out on a trek to Mission Springs.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mario Arsatti claims to be an acquaintance of a good friend from Lucas' past. But it's pleasure before business. Mario has been hired to kill Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas, who blames his wife's death on his father-in-law, refuses to help the old man elude a gang of gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The lazy Jackman brother's mortgage has been foreclosed. Unfit for farming, they head to a nearby town. The family patriarch becomes marshal and deputizes his sons.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his girlfriend discover that an old hermit is very lonely. Old Tony invites them to lunch and lets them look for arrowheads on a remote part of his land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark decide to enter a local turkey shoot to raise money to buy a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Cattle baron Oat Jackford orders his two cowboys to run Lucas McCain and his son off their ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark gets caught on a mountain ledge, a young outlaw risks his life to rescue him and breaks his leg doing so.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The notorious Shelton rides into the town of North Fork to take revenge on an elderly Marshal who is now crippled and working for Lucas McCain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Johnny Gibbs, Lucas McCain's brother-in-law, visits the McCain ranch. Gibbs, a rodeo rider wanted by the law, begins stirring up trouble.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A vengeful judge who believes Lucas was responsible for his son's death, kidnaps Mark McCain to revenge himself on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A handsome Italian count arrives in North Fork. The town bully ridicules his manner of speech and dress and provokes the Count to challenge him to a duel.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A hobo, clown, bagpipe player, ballerina and military officer are trapped in a huge cylinder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A gung-ho young soldier gets a new viewpoint on war when he inexplicably changes places with a Japanese officer trying to stop his superior from leading a charge against American forces.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Paul Radin has invited three people to join him in his bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A vagrant steps into a murdered gangster's expensive shoes and is taken over by the dead man's ghost, who vows to remain on Earth to seek revenge against his killer.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: On a hunting trip, Hyder Simpson and his dog Rip dive into a lake after a raccoon. When he gets home he finds that no one can see or hear him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Actor Rance McGrew makes TV Westerns for a living, but he's a lousy actor and a worse cowboy. Despite that, each week he "wins" against the bad guys. Finally, the bad guys have had enough and decide to teach McGrew a lesson.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The senior residents of Sunnyvale decide that the secret to youth is acting young, and in particular playing a childhood game called "kick-the-can.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Fortune discovers that a piano he bought his wife for her birthday has magical properties - the music that it plays makes people reveal their true essence.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Jeff Myrtlebank comes back to life at his own funeral and soon begins to act very strangely...

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Kanamits, 9-foot tall aliens, arrive on Earth with one lofty goal: To Serve Man.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Old Ben, who is able to transform himself into anything, tries to help a crippled little girl.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Old Ben, who is able to transform himself into anything, tries to help a crippled little girl.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: David Gurney wakes up to find that no one - his wife, his co-workers, his best friend, not even his own mother knows him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An astronaut declares himself a god when his ship lands on a planet populated by people smaller than ants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Oliver Crangle is a bitter, prejudiced man. Through unknown means, he intends to shrink every evil person in the world at four o'clock.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A loud-mouthed braggart's boasts attract the attention of some aliens.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An elderly couple visit the New Life Corporation, hoping to transport their personalities into youthful artificial bodies.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An alien who crash-lands into a remote mountain village stirs up the villagers' fears and animosity, but he befriends a little boy and gives him a mysterious present.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A ventriloquist is convinced that his dummy, Willie, is alive and evil. He makes plans for a new act with a new dummy: plans that Willie doesn't support!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a newlywed couple briefly returns to the groom's childhood home, the ties of the past prove too strong to resist.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A widower buys a robot grandmother for his three children.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Cavender, an angel trying to win his wings, tries to help down-on-her-luck Agnes, who has just been fired.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An elderly private school teacher wonders if his life has meant anything as he contemplates suicide on Christmas Eve and is reminded by former students that he has, indeed, had an impact on their lives.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A scientist creates an android that has the qualities which he feels he's lacking.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A simple scavenging run proves to be more tricky, when the survivors are not the only ones after a goldmine of supplies.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After realizing that Alexandria may not be as safe as he originally thought, Rick must make decisions about where to go.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others determine that the only way to keep peace in Alexandria, is to wage a war with a new enemy.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After a minor success, two members of the group are taken hostage; Carol struggles morally with the lengths she has gone to survive.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Two separate groups leave Alexandria for supplies, and while both worry over the future of the community, they will face immediate danger.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When someone goes missing in Alexandria, the community goes on alert, and search parties venture out.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: To save one of their own, Rick's group must venture outside the walls; their experience changes their lives forever.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: As the members of the group remain helpless, Negan takes action that will forever haunt those who survive.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: For a number of familiar faces, a new, well-established community seems too good to be true.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A new group of survivors seem to have it all in their impressive community; however, there is a price.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Saddled with grief and surrounded by enemies, members of the group try to find safety at the Hilltop before it's too late.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Someone stumbles upon a brand new society unlike anything seen before.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A deeper look at the Sanctuary and the world of the Saviors; members of Alexandria look for supplies.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En Woodbury, Michonne desconfía del Gobernador y planea irse sin Andrea. En la prisión, un sabotaje provoca que una horda de zombis penetre en la cárcel y, mientras Rick y sus compañeros los combaten, Lori entra en trabajo de parto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick está totalmente abatido por la muerte de Lori, pero recibe una llamada telefónica sorprendente. Entretanto, Michonne ha descubierto el secreto del Gobernador y se dispone a abandonar Woodbury, a pesar de que Andrea quiere permanecer allá.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Michonne ve a Glenn y Maggie buscando provisiones, pero alguien más los observa: Merle, quien reconoce a Glenn como uno de los que le abandonó, a merced de los zombis, en una azotea de Atlanta. Entretanto, Rick sigue mentalmente inestable.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Michonne conduce a Rick, Daryl y Oscar a Woodbury para rescatar a Glenn y Maggie, a quienes el Gobernador está torturando para sonsacarles dónde se oculta el grupo de Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo de Rick invade Woodbury con la intención de rescatar a Glenn y Maggie. Michonne descubre el secreto familiar que oculta el Gobernador cuando trata de asesinarlo. En la prisión, un grupo desconocido atraviesa la verja de seguridad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Después de la batalla contra el Gobernador, Rick y Carl encuentran una casa en la que Rick intenta reponerse de sus graves heridas y Carl sale en busca de alimentos. Mientras, Michonne trata de encontrarlos.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En secreto, el Gobernador y sus hombres preparan una incursión mortal contra la prisión. Darryl y Merle lleguen en mitad de la contienda.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El Gobernador permite a Andrea, acompañada de Milton, ir a la prisión a negociar la paz con su antiguo grupo. Mientras, Tyreese y Sasha llegan a Woodbury y le ofrecen al Gobernador información sobre la prisión a cambio de poder quedarse allá.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick, Michonne y Carl viajan al condado de Rick en busca de armamento y encuentran a alguien a quien creían muerto. Durante la misión, Rick cambia la percepción que tiene de Michonne.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Andrea concierta un encuentro entre Rick y el Gobernador para que negocien la paz, pero el Gobernador exige la cabeza de Michonne a cambio del alto el fuego.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Andrea descubre la verdad sobre el Gobernador e intenta huir para alertar al grupo de Rick, pero el Gobernador envía a sus hombres en su busca. Entretanto, alguien ha provocado un sabotaje en Woodbury y los sospechosos son Tyreese y Milton.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick duda entre entregarle o no a Michonne al Gobernador y poner así fin a la contienda. Sin embargo, Merle se anticipa a las órdenes de Rick y decide tomar una decisión por su propia cuenta.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El Gobernador y sus hombres lanzan un ataque contra la prisión, pero el grupo de Rick se defiende. Al final de la contienda, solo una de las dos comunidades podrá seguir existiendo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los supervivientes de Woodbury se han unido al grupo de Rick en la prisión, crían animales, cultivan y todo parece ir bien. Sin embargo, el grupo va a descubrir que el peligro no siempre llega desde afuera.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick establece una cuarentena para evitar que el virus se propague entre la población de la cárcel. Tyreese descubre que alguien ha asesinado y quemado los cadáveres de su novia y su amigo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl encabeza un grupo que sale de la cárcel en busca de medicamentos y, durante el trayecto, oyen por radio que alguien habla de un santuario. Rick averigua quién asesinó a Karen y David y por qué lo hizo.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Gov. Bradford and his secretary, Miss Piecemeal, watch as the governor's statue is unveiled during a private showing at the Bolt Museum. Suddenly, the statue blinks, and Bradford, immobilized by an injection, is taken prisoner.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: U.S. secret agent James T. West is lured into a hospital where he is gassed and carried out in a coffin by the weird, zombie-like aides of one Dr. Arcularis.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West poses as a notorious desperado, Frank Slade, inaplan to arrest a Mexican bandit, Colonel Vasquez, who has been robbing banks in American border towns and then fleeing to the sanctuary of Mexico.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Iron Man Torres strangles a shop owner named Gilbert as secret agent James T. West passes by.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon set out to crack a thriving opium-and-alien smuggling operation in San Francisco and become involved in struggle for control of Hunan Province, China.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West is investigating the loss of government suppliers of kerosene and copper when his stagecoach is halted by a sheet of flame.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon, assigned to protect a Middle Eastern despot from assassination, find their task complicated by the attitude of the degenerate tyrant, Emir El Emid.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon help Governor Lewis keep the state of California solvent by seeing that a pledged $5,000,000 from each of three wealthy but disreputable personsis turned over to the governor.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Two U.S. Supreme Court Justices have died mysteriously but Justice Chaynedis misses secret agent James T. West's concern for his life.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West poses as a Federal prison inspector and his side-kick, Artemus Gordon, pretends he is a preacher when the two are assigned to halt an organized outbreak of terror that has paralyzed a western community.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agents James T. West and Artemus Gordon are assigned to protect South Seas island prince who insists on going to an exclusive health resort where assassins are waiting to kill him.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West, probing the murder by fire of one of his former professors, Dr. Robey, a distinguished archaeologist, is ordered off the case at the request of U.S. Senator Hungerford.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Posing as a notorious hired gunman and a corrupt colonel, secret agents James T.West and Artemus Gordon infiltrate the forces of renegade-army leader Thorald Wolfe.

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Secret agent James T. West is asking the Serbian minister to place his country's fabulous Kara diamond in federal custody until the International Jewel Exhibit opens, when suddenly the gem's case explodes and the jewel disappears.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Richard installs a shutoff valve for washing machine supply hoses; Ross and Heath discuss the progression of EV chargers; Jenn discusses ornamental grasses; Nathan helps a homeowner repair her deck.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Kevin and Tom travel to Montana to set up an accessible home gym for a Navy SEAL veteran; Mauro shares how to select the right paint color; Mark updates a fireplace with a stacked stone veneer.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Nathan builds a display case to store his grandfather's U.S. flag; Heath replaces a circuit breaker; the team shares the ways their trades were affected by the COVID-19 pandemic.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom travels to Colorado to help a couple build a swing set; Jenn travels to Raleigh to build a self-watering vegetable garden; Mark helps a homeowner build a firepit that comes in a kit.

programme.title: Ask This Old House

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom travels to Chicago to transform a garage into a woodworking shop; Richard travels to Akron, Ohio to install a heater for a garage workshop; Tom and Kevin build a tool storage shelf.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Kevin learns how quartz countertops are made and helps install one; Richard repairs a hot water shutoff valve in order to replace a kitchen sink faucet; Nathan upgrades kitchen cabinets to soft-close.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Richard discusses pipe soldering; Heath explains what two-prong receptacles are, why they're no longer to code, and how to replace them; Nathan and Mauro build, install, and paint deck stair railings.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Richard explains the options available for water heaters; Jenn creates a landscape that can withstand heavy pedestrian traffic; Tom and Kevin build a cutting board out of walnut, cherry, and maple.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Jenn discusses creative options for ground cover plants; Tom demonstrates different techniques for patching wall holes; Mark demonstrates how to patch brick holes; Nathan installs a new threshold.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Mauro demonstrates how to remove dried paint from a paintbrush; Tom shares the best techniques for connecting and installing tongue and groove flooring; Jenn and Nathan build a DIY ice rink.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Ross discusses the pros and cons of smart doorbells; Mauro demonstrates techniques for painting wood paneling; Heath shares some of his most-used tools and helps a homeowner install recessed lights.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Mark explains how bricks are made and how many different varieties there are; Richard explains how solderless connections work; Tom assesses and reshingles a shed roof with asphalt shingles.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Jenn shares how to put a garden to bed before winter; Mauro demonstrates how to paint a kitchen cabinet; Nathan installs exterior front door trim.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: The entire team comes together to help Mark rebuild the chicken barn he lost to a fire. They reframe the barn, hook up new electrical wiring, connect a utility sink, and hang an exterior door.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: In Tool Lab, Nathan explains the options available on drill drivers; Heath describes why and how to use a voltage tester; Mauro holds a paintbrush; Mark helps a homeowner extend her existing patio.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Tom works with a young woodworker to set up a kids' workshop in her father's garage. He helps her to build a workbench, set it up with tools and handy storage, and then they build a birdhouse.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Jenn explains how to identify and care for holly plants; Richard explains how dishwashers work and how to troubleshoot them when they don't drain properly; Tom and Kevin turn Christmas ornaments.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: In Tool Lab, Nathan explains the different table saw blade types; Ross extends WiFi service in a house; Richard replaces a faulty tub drain; the team shares their New Years' Resolutions.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Mark shares the story of how he became a mason; Tom explains why wood rots on houses, how to prevent it, and how to repair it if it occurs; Ross explores heat pump technology.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Heath explains why finish electrical work is his favorite stage of the job; Mauro demonstrates how to repair a crack in plaster; Mark raises a drywell in a driveway that is sinking below grade.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: The entire cast reflects on the twentieth anniversary of Ask This Old House. Theyll discuss how the show was made and what they think the legacy of the television program will be moving forward.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Jenn shares how she became a landscape designer; Richard and Ross explain cost-effective ways to save money on your heating bill this winter; Nathan helps a homeowner replace a vinyl kitchen floor.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
